subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|査%閲|さ%えつ}}: an [[on-site]] [[inspection]]; to [[inspect]] [[on-site]]
* {{ja-r|査%検|さ%けん}}: an [[inspection]], a [[test]], an [[audit]]; to [[inspect]], to [[test]], to [[audit]]
* {{ja-r|査%験|さ%けん}}: an [[inspection]], a [[test]], an [[audit]]; to [[inspect]], to [[test]], to [[audit]]
* {{ja-r|検%査|けん%さ}}: an [[inspection]], a [[test]], an [[audit]]; to [[inspect]], to [[test]], to [[audit]]
* {{ja-r|査%察|さ%さつ}}: a [[visual]] [[inspection]] or [[observation]]; to [[inspect]] or [[observe]] [[visually]]
* {{ja-r|査%察%官|さ%さつ%かん}}: an [[inspector]]
* {{ja-r|査%収|さ%しゅう}}: [[inspection]] and [[reception]] {{qualifier|as of a shipment of goods}}; to [[inspect]] and [[receive]]
* {{ja-r|査%証|さ%しょう}}: a [[visa]] {{qualifier|literally, proof of inspection}}
* {{ja-r|査%証%料|さ%しょう%りょう}}: a [[visa]] [[fee]]
* {{ja-r|査%定|さ%てい}}: an [[assessment]]; to [[assess]]
* {{ja-r|査%定 価%格|さ%てい か%かく}}: [[assessed]] [[value]]
* {{ja-r|査%定%額|さ%てい%がく}}: [[assessed]] [[price]] or [[amount]]
* {{ja-r|査%定 期%間|さ%てい き%かん}}: an [[assessor]] {{qualifier|an organization}}, an [[assessing]] [[office]] or [[agency]]
* {{ja-r|査%定%者|さ%てい%しゃ}}: an [[assessor]] {{qualifier|a person}}
* {{ja-r|査%問|さ%もん}}: an [[inquiry]] {{qualifier|emphasis on inspection or investigation}}; to [[inquire]]
* {{ja-r|査%問 委%員%会|さ%もん い%いん%かい}}: an [[inquiry]] [[commission]] or [[board]]
* {{ja-r|査%覈|さ%かく}}: {{qualifier|rare, possibly obsolete}} an [[investigation]], an [[inspection]] of the [[unknown]]; to [[investigate]]
* {{ja-r|山%査%子|さん%ざ%し}}: [[hawthorn]], [[Chinese hawthorn]]
{{der-bottom}}
